Bauhaus Quickstart

Installation

Via Composer

The Bauhaus package utilizes Composer for the installation in Laravel. If you havenâ€™t already, start by installing Composer.

Now you can install Laravel by issuing the following command from your terminal: composer create-project laravel/laravel your-project-name --prefer-dist
